page.title: 18EVENTS
page.content: {New Landmark}A company operating a { {Radio-Phone Network}wants to erect a {100'Transmitter Mast}on the top of { {Crow Hill}one of the highest spots in the area.The planning application is for a directional antennae radio base station surrounded by a security fence.Planning application refused. {Water Bore Holes.}The increase in population and mdern requirements have exceeded the traditional {Spring Water suppies.For this area five private bore holes have been sunk to obtain greater consistency and quality.{ {Surface Water}varies seasonably and is affected by bacterial and chemical pollutants.{Water Table Water}produces a constant supply from saturated ground about 100' deep and is purer because it has percolated through the ground.
